response_parsed.title: Securing WebAssembly (WASM) Targets using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a guide on how to implement security measures for WebAssembly (WASM) targets when using FastAPI with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understand the importance of securing WASM targets in FastAPI applications
Learn about common vulnerabilities and their mitigation strategies
Implement authentication, authorization, and rate limiting for secure access control
Use security libraries such as Sanic-CORS, FastAPI-RateLimiter, JWT, and OAuth2 for added protection

code_examples.code:
from sanic import Sanic, CORS
app = Sanic()
cors_policy = {'Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET, POST, OPTIONS'}
app.configure(CORS(cors_policy))

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide
